pages.text: Har pajomʙare, ki ʙar pesinijonason maʙ'us sud, hamin guna guftand: «[U jo] Codugar ast jo devona»
Ojo jakdigarro ʙa in [kufru takziʙ] suporis karda ʙudand? Na, ʙalki mardume sarkas ʙudand
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az onon ruj ʙigardon, ki tu [ʙa xotiri kufri onon] hargiz sazovori sarzanis nesti
Va [pajvasta ʙa onon] tazakkur ʙideh, ki, hatman, tazakkur ʙaroi mu'minon sudʙaxs ast
Va cinnu insro faqat ʙaroi in ofaridam, ki Maro iʙodat kunand [va az ʙandagii digaron sar ʙoz zanand]
Na az onon ruzi mexoham, na in ki Maro xurok dihand
[Zero] Alloh taolo ast, ki ruzirasoni nerumand va ʙarqaror ast
Sitamgoron [-i musrik niz] hamcun joron [-i guzasta]-i xes sahme az azoʙ dorand; pas, ʙa sitoʙ [onro] az Man naxohand
Pas, voj ʙar kofiron az [azoʙi] ruzi mav'udason
Savgand ʙa kuhi Tur
va savgand ʙa kitoʙi navistasuda
Dar sahifahoi kusuda
Va savgand ʙa «Bajtu-l-ma'mur» [ki faristagon dar on ʙa iʙodati Parvardigor masƣuland]
Va savgand ʙa [osmoni ʙaland hamon] saqfi ʙarafrosta [ʙar zamin]
Va savgand ʙa darjoi oganda [az oʙ]
Ki ʙe tardid, azoʙi Parvardigorat ʙa vuqu' xohad pajvast
Va hec ʙozdorandae onro ʙoznadorad
Ruze, ki osmon ʙa saxti dar cunʙis va iztiroʙ aftad
Va kuhho ʙa harakate sadid ravon savand
Dar on ruz voj ʙa holi takziʙkunandagon
Hamon kasone, ki dar ʙehudagui sargarmi ʙoziand
Ruze, ki ʙo xusunat ʙa suji otasi duzax ronda mesavand
